Post.title: MakeMakefile
Post._content:
Make

<!--more-->

## MakeMakefile

MakeGNU MakeMakefileMake

Makefile

```makefile
TARGET...: DEPENDENCIES...
	COMMAND
	...
```

- TARGETclean
- DEPENDENCIES
- COMMANDshellshellmakeTAB

DEPENDENCIESCOMMANDmakeTABShell

## DEMO

main.cA.cB.cmainAB

```makefile
main: main.o A.o B.o
	gcc -o main main.o A.o B.o
main.o: main.c
	gcc -c main.c
A.o: A.c
	gcc -c A.c
B.o: B.c
	gcc -c B.c
clean:
	rm *.o
	rm main
```

makeA.cB.cmakemake clean
